---
mode: "cc-principal-software-engineer"
description: "Updates the summary of the repository readme with specific details about a feature."
---

Follow the instructions in #file:./cc-write-readme.prompt.md but focus on
the specific file or directory specified by the user.
After updating the `README.md` file, also create or update files in the `docs/features/`
directory with detailed documentation about the specific feature.

Focus on one file or directory specified by the user. If the user does not
specify a file or directory, ask them to do so.
